channel.title: Moving simple things
channel.description:
Ok well how do i move altars? i want to change altar locations at home.
Also i would really like to know how to move a thieing stall.
Thanks :D

item.title: Moving simple things
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

Well, If the thieving stalls are already put on the server,

go to your “client.java”

ctrl + F

search for, “globalobjects”

and you should come up to the public void “newobjects()”,

below that, there should be some

makeGlobalObject(####, ####, !!!!, 0, 10);

depending on your source, the first two “####”, would be the x and y coords, and the “!!!” would be the object id.

the “0” is the face of the object, and 10 is the type of object it is, ex. floor objects is 10.

Hope I helped

Read full topic
